com.google.code.arm.sql
Class AutoCloseables

java.lang.Object
  com.google.code.arm.sql.AutoCloseables

public class AutoCloseables
extends Object

Utility methods for adapting java.sql.* types to instances that implement AutoCloseable. This class is intended to be statically imported (e.g. import static com.google.code.arm.AutoCloseables.*). Where possible, the instances returned by these methods will return AutoCloseable instances (e.g. AutoCloseConnection.prepareStatement(String) returns an AutoClosePreparedStatement that implements AutoCloseable). Note that all methods throw NullPointerException for null arguments.
